item.sql: select to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), max(SORT_HEAP_ALLOCATED) as SORT_HEAP_ALLOCATED ,max(SORT_SHRHEAP_ALLOCATED) as SORT_SHRHEAP_ALLOCATED ,max(SORT_SHRHEAP_TOP) as SORT_SHRHEAP_TOP ,max(POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_SORTS) as POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_SORTS ,max(TOTAL_SORTS) TOTAL_SORTS ,max(TOTAL_SORT_TIME) TOTAL_SORT_TIME ,max(SORT_OVERFLOWS) SORT_OVERFLOWS ,max(TOTAL_HASH_JOINS) TOTAL_HASH_JOINS ,max(TOTAL_HASH_LOOPS) as TOTAL_HASH_LOOPS ,max(HASH_JOIN_OVERFLOWS) HASH_JOIN_OVERFLOWS ,max(HASH_JOIN_SMALL_OVERFLOWS) as HASH_JOIN_SMALL_OVERFLOWS ,max(POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_HASH_JOINS) as POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_HASH_JOINS ,max(ACTIVE_HASH_JOINS) as ACTIVE_HASH_JOINS from dbsmt.snapdb group by to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

select to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), max(SORT_HEAP_ALLOCATED) as SORT_HEAP_ALLOCATED ,max(SORT_SHRHEAP_ALLOCATED) as SORT_SHRHEAP_ALLOCATED ,max(SORT_SHRHEAP_TOP) as SORT_SHRHEAP_TOP ,max(POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_SORTS) as POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_SORTS ,max(hash_join_loop) ,max(TOTAL_SORTS) TOTAL_SORTS ,max(TOTAL_SORT_TIME) TOTAL_SORT_TIME ,max(SORT_OVERFLOWS) SORT_OVERFLOWS ,max(TOTAL_HASH_JOINS) TOTAL_HASH_JOINS ,max(TOTAL_HASH_LOOPS) as TOTAL_HASH_LOOPS ,max(HASH_JOIN_OVERFLOWS) HASH_JOIN_OVERFLOWS ,max(HASH_JOIN_SMALL_OVERFLOWS) as HASH_JOIN_SMALL_OVERFLOWS ,max(POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_HASH_JOINS) as POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_HASH_JOINS ,max(ACTIVE_HASH_JOINS) as ACTIVE_HASH_JOINS from dbsmt.snapdb group by to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), * from dbsmt.snapdb
select * from dbsmt.snapdb

select to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), max(SORT_HEAP_ALLOCATED) as SORT_HEAP_ALLOCATED ,max(SORT_SHRHEAP_ALLOCATED) as SORT_SHRHEAP_ALLOCATED ,max(SORT_SHRHEAP_TOP) as SORT_SHRHEAP_TOP ,max(POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_SORTS) as POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_SORTS ,max(TOTAL_SORTS) TOTAL_SORTS ,max(TOTAL_SORT_TIME) TOTAL_SORT_TIME ,max(SORT_OVERFLOWS) SORT_OVERFLOWS ,max(TOTAL_HASH_JOINS) TOTAL_HASH_JOINS ,max(TOTAL_HASH_LOOPS) as TOTAL_HASH_LOOPS ,max(HASH_JOIN_OVERFLOWS) HASH_JOIN_OVERFLOWS ,max(HASH_JOIN_SMALL_OVERFLOWS) as HASH_JOIN_SMALL_OVERFLOWS ,max(POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_HASH_JOINS) as POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_HASH_JOINS ,max(ACTIVE_HASH_JOINS) as ACTIVE_HASH_JOINS from dbisw.snapdb group by to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select * from dbsmt.snapdb

select to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), max(SORT_HEAP_ALLOCATED) as SORT_HEAP_ALLOCATED ,max(SORT_SHRHEAP_ALLOCATED) as SORT_SHRHEAP_ALLOCATED ,max(SORT_SHRHEAP_TOP) as SORT_SHRHEAP_TOP ,max(POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_SORTS) as POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_SORTS ,max(TOTAL_SORTS) TOTAL_SORTS ,max(TOTAL_SORT_TIME) TOTAL_SORT_TIME ,max(SORT_OVERFLOWS) SORT_OVERFLOWS ,max(TOTAL_HASH_JOINS) TOTAL_HASH_JOINS ,max(TOTAL_HASH_LOOPS) as TOTAL_HASH_LOOPS ,max(HASH_JOIN_OVERFLOWS) HASH_JOIN_OVERFLOWS ,max(HASH_JOIN_SMALL_OVERFLOWS) as HASH_JOIN_SMALL_OVERFLOWS ,max(POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_HASH_JOINS) as POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_HASH_JOINS ,max(ACTIVE_HASH_JOINS) as ACTIVE_HASH_JOINS from dbsmt.snapdb group by to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

select to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), max(SORT_HEAP_ALLOCATED) as SORT_HEAP_ALLOCATED ,max(SORT_SHRHEAP_ALLOCATED) as SORT_SHRHEAP_ALLOCATED ,max(SORT_SHRHEAP_TOP) as SORT_SHRHEAP_TOP ,max(POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_SORTS) as POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_SORTS ,max(TOTAL_SORTS) TOTAL_SORTS ,max(TOTAL_SORT_TIME) TOTAL_SORT_TIME ,max(SORT_OVERFLOWS) SORT_OVERFLOWS ,max(TOTAL_HASH_JOINS) TOTAL_HASH_JOINS ,max(TOTAL_HASH_LOOPS) as TOTAL_HASH_LOOPS ,max(HASH_JOIN_OVERFLOWS) HASH_JOIN_OVERFLOWS ,max(HASH_JOIN_SMALL_OVERFLOWS) as HASH_JOIN_SMALL_OVERFLOWS ,max(POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_HASH_JOINS) as POST_SHRTHRESHOLD_HASH_JOINS ,max(ACTIVE_HASH_JOINS) as ACTIVE_HASH_JOINS from dbswk.snapdb group by to_char(snapshot_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

select * from dbsmt.TCBSTAT_TABLE
select count(*) from dbsmt.TCBSTAT_TABLE
select * from dbsmt.TCBSTAT_TABLE fetch first 10 row only
select * from dbsmt.TCBSTAT_TABLE order by overflow_accessed desc fetch first 10 row only
select * from dbsmt.TCBSTAT_TABLE order by overflow_accesses desc fetch first 10 row only
